rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language ('said', 'source... is not known', 'no other cases were found').
No moderate verbs paired with scale/impact found.
This segment reports facts and absence of cases ('no other cases were found'), a bare negation handled under Q7.
